tasks.title: A0: Copy prototype to project
tasks.description: Copy App Prototype contents to PixelMilk-App/src directory

tasks.title: A1: Verify prototype runs
tasks.description: Run npm install and npm run dev to verify the prototype code works

tasks.title: A2: Create missing directories
tasks.description: Create directories: stores/, hooks/, styles/, services/storage/, services/gemini/, components/shared/, components/layout/

tasks.title: A3: Extend types
tasks.description: Extend src/types.ts with: TabId, TabConfig, ToolMode, CanvasState, GenerationStatus, GeminiConfig, GeminiModel, TaskType, QualityMode, AssetType, Asset

tasks.title: B1: Create terminal styles
tasks.description: Create src/styles/variables.css and src/styles/global.css with terminal aesthetic (pub green #021a1a, mint #8bd0ba, VT323 font, NO rounded corners, grid background)

tasks.title: B2: Create shared UI components
tasks.description: Create in src/components/shared/: Button.tsx (variants: primary, secondary, danger, ghost), Input.tsx (with label and error), Select.tsx, Panel.tsx, index.ts barrel export

tasks.title: B3: Extend Gemini service
tasks.description: Add model router to geminiService.ts or create services/gemini/modelRouter.ts with getModelForTask() and getConfigForTask() functions

tasks.title: B4: Create storage service
tasks.description: Create src/services/storage/ with db.ts (IndexedDB via idb with localStorage fallback), assets.ts (CRUD), settings.ts (API key), index.ts

tasks.title: C1: Create Zustand store
tasks.description: Create src/stores/appStore.ts with apiKey, activeTab, generationStatus, modal state and setters. Create index.ts barrel export

tasks.title: C2: Create layout components
tasks.description: Create src/components/layout/ with TabBar.tsx, ApiKeyModal.tsx (with API connection test), AppShell.tsx, ErrorBoundary.tsx, index.ts

tasks.title: C3: Wire up App
tasks.description: Update src/App.tsx to use AppShell, render 6 tabs with placeholder content, import global styles

tasks.title: D1: Smoke test
tasks.description: Verify: Modal on first load, API key validation, persistence, 6 tabs work, terminal aesthetic correct, no console errors
